content.original: The Articulated Jump Jet System is a collection of refined thrusters and exhausts controls that allows a Battlemech to achieve increased mobility at cost of Jump distance. Specially designed for use on 'Mechs 90 tons and heavier.
content.prevOriginal: The Articulated Jump Jet System is a collection of refined thrusters and exhausts controls that allows a Battlemech to achieve increased mobility at cost of Jump distance. Specially designed for use on 'Mechs 90 tons and heavier.
content.content: 铰接式跳跃推进器系统(A)是一组精巧的推进器和排气控制装置,以战斗机甲的跳跃距离为代价获得更高的机动性.专门被设计用于90吨及以上的机甲上.

content.original: Jump Jets funnel superheated air to propel 'Mechs over obstacles in a controlled manner. Additionally, they may also be used to perform the dreaded 'Death from Above' attack. Heavy Jump Jets are specially designed for use on 'Mechs from 60 to 85 tons.
content.prevOriginal: Jump Jets funnel superheated air to propel 'Mechs over obstacles in a controlled manner. Additionally, they may also be used to perform the dreaded 'Death from Above' attack. Heavy Jump Jets are specially designed for use on 'Mechs from 60 to 85 tons.
content.content: 跳跃推进器将过热的空气的以可控的方式喷出,以推举机甲越过障碍物.此外它们还可以用于执行可怕的"DFA"攻击.重型跳跃推进器专门为60-85吨的机甲设计.

content.prevOriginal: This Jump Jets Heat Generation per Hex
content.content: 这个跳跃推进器每格产热

content.original: This is less like a jump Jet and more of a straight up Rocket Booster strapped to its own Fusion Core, it surely will lift anything its attached to. It can be mounted in a way to propel a mech forward as easily as upward.
content.prevOriginal: This is less like a jump Jet and more of a straight up Rocket Booster strapped to its own Fusion Core, it surely will lift anything its attached to. It can be mounted in a way to propel a mech forward as easily as upward.
content.content: 这不像是一个跳跃推进器,而更像是绑在自己机甲上聚变核心上的直起式的火箭助推器,它可以将它所附着的任何东西发射起来.它为让一架机甲尽可能容易的向上前进而安装.

content.original: Directional Jump Jets are a specialized selection of smaller Jump Jets strategically placed around the chassis, capable to grant finer control over a Jump, improving the Death From Above Maneuver. Specially designed for use on 'Mechs 90 tons and heavier.
content.prevOriginal: Directional Jump Jets are a specialized selection of smaller Jump Jets strategically placed around the chassis, capable to grant finer control over a Jump, improving the Death From Above Maneuver. Specially designed for use on 'Mechs 90 tons and heavier.
content.content: 定向跳跃推进器是一种特殊选择,更小的跳跃推进器可以战略性的放置在底盘上,能够对跳跃进行更精细的控制,提升DFA机动.专门被设计用于90吨以上的机甲.

content.original: This 'Jump Jet' was straight ripped out of a Dropship and fitted for a SuperHeavy Chassis. It surely will lift everything and maybe you even land upright after if whatever God you pray to is listening. Requires Booster Jet to be installed.
content.prevOriginal: This 'Jump Jet' was straight ripped out of a Dropship and fitted for a SuperHeavy Chassis. It surely will lift everything and maybe you even land upright after if whatever God you pray to is listening. Requires Booster Jet to be installed.
content.content: 这个跳跃推进器是直接从一艘登陆舰上撕下来的,安装在一个超重底盘上.它会提升一切,如果你向上帝祈祷,他有可能会让你站立着陆.需要安装在有喷气助推器.

content.original: The Partial Wing System increases Jump Jet jump distance by 30%
content.prevOriginal: The Partial Wing System increases Jump Jet jump distance by 30%
content.content: 偏翼系统提升30%跳跃推进器跳跃的距离.

content.original: Jump Jets funnel superheated air to propel 'Mechs over obstacles in a controlled manner. Additionally, they may also be used to perform the dreaded 'Death from Above' attack. Standard Jump Jets are specially designed for use on 'Mechs up to 55 tons.
content.prevOriginal: Jump Jets funnel superheated air to propel 'Mechs over obstacles in a controlled manner. Additionally, they may also be used to perform the dreaded 'Death from Above' attack. Standard Jump Jets are specially designed for use on 'Mechs up to 55 tons.
content.content: 跳跃推进器可控的喷射超热空气来推举机甲越过障碍物.还可以用于执行可怕的"DFA"攻击.突击式跳跃推进器专门被设计用于最高55吨上的机甲

content.original: This Jump Jets Heat Generation per Hex
content.prevOriginal: This Jump Jets Heat Generation per Hex
content.content: 这个跳跃推进器每格产热
